original: Lindvall, Carl Harald Gunnar, jur. kand., civilekonom, stadskamrer, Karlshamn, f. 18/11/93 i Jönköp. av lärov:-lär. Carl Fredrik L. o. Olga Elisabet Fredrika Federmesser. G. 35-47 m. Inga Mildred Rosholm. Barn: Bengt Olof f. 40, Marie-Louise Cecilia 42, — Stud:ex. i Lund 15, DHS 23, jur. kand. 31. Advokatverksamhet. Stadskamrer i Karlshamn 33, handelslärare vid Karlshamns tekniska yrkessk. 36, stadsombudsman i Landskrona 38, åter stadskamrer i Karlshamn s. å., ett flert. förordn. som stadsfiskal o. polischef isamt rådman där. Kronoombud i andra tax:distr. 43, drätselkamm. sekr. o. ombudsman 44, sekr. i kyrko-fullm. samt ordf. i kommunaltj :m :-fören. 45, v. ordf. i Karlshamns mu-siksällsk. 35-45. Hobbies: målning o. musik (piano).
translated: Lindvall, Carl Harald Gunnar, LL.B., B.B.A., city treasurer, Karlshamn, b. 18/11/93 in Jönköping, son of the teacher Carl Fredrik L. and Olga Elisabet Fredrika Federmesser. Married from 1935 to 1947 to Inga Mildred Rosholm. Children: Bengt Olof b. 1940, Marie-Louise Cecilia b. 1942. Education: graduated from Lund University 1915, completed dental hygiene studies in 1923, obtained LL.B. degree in 1931. Worked as a lawyer. City treasurer in Karlshamn from 1933, commercial teacher at Karlshamn Technical Vocational School from 1936, city attorney in Landskrona from 1938, resumed position as city treasurer in Karlshamn the same year, appointed as city prosecutor and police chief, as well as councilman. Crown officer in other tax districts from 1943, secretary and officer of the municipal board in 1944, secretary of the church council and chairman of the municipal officials' association in 1945, deputy chairman of Karlshamn music society from 1935 to 1945. Hobbies: painting and music (piano).
